name: She Cannot Enjoy
description:
This is the story of she, of her, of everyone.

She has a life limited in possibilities. She was educated like that, and the world around her too.

She cannot do anything about it, she thinks. She cannot study, she cannot read, she cannot go out alone, she cannot show herself... She cannot enjoy her own life.

If only there was a way to stop it...

And there is.
